mapper.select: select paper.*, question.id questionId, question.title questionTitle, question.type questionType, question.options questionOptions, question.right_option questionRightOptions, question.judge_answer questionJudgeAnswer from paper left join paper_question pq on paper.id = pq.paper_id left join question on pq.question_id = question.id where paper.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_result(paper_id, student_id, total_score, single_answer, multi_answer, judge_answer, right_single, right_multi, right_judge, create_time) values (#{paperId}, #{studentId}, #{totalScore}, #{singleAnswer}, #{multiAnswer}, #{judgeAnswer}, #{rightSingle}, #{rightMulti}, #{rightJudge}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select exam.id examId, paper.title paperTitle, paper.type paperType, paper.difficulty_degree paperDifficultyDegree, paper.total_question paperTotalQuestion, paper.total_score totalScore, paper.total_single_choice totalSingle, paper.total_multi_choice totalMulti, paper.total_judge_choice totalJudge, exam.right_single rightSingle, exam.right_multi rightMulti, exam.right_judge rightJudge, exam.create_time createTime from exam_result exam,paper where 1=1 and exam.student_id = #{studentId} and exam.paper_id = paper.id
and paper.course_id = #{courseId}

select exam.id examId, exam.paper_id paperId, exam.single_answer singleAnswer, exam.multi_answer multiAnswer, exam.judge_answer judgeAnswer, paper.title paperTitle from exam_result exam,paper where exam.id = #{examId} and paper.id = exam.paper_id
select * from paper where paper.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
